theJungle:RandomizePower.NAME: Selective Confusion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, randomizes the cost of a number of cards in your hand equal to how much is stacked.
If your hand has less cards than the number of stacks, the remaining stacks will hold over until your next turn.
